title: Beer Mug

nouns: A pub, formally public house, is a drinking establishment fundamental to the culture of Britain, Ireland, Australia, Canada, New England, South Africa and New Zealand.

A sector of the economy in which an aggregate of commercial enterprises is engaged in the manufacture and marketing of beverages made from malt and hops by steeping, boiling and fermentation, such as beer, ale and other related beverages.
Alcoholic drink
An alcoholic drink fermented from starch material commonly barley malt, often with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor.

An alcoholic beverage commonly fermented from barley malt, with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor.

That which intoxicates; an intoxicating agent; as, alcohol, opium and laughing gas are intoxicants.

Drink
Sometimes referred to as "alcohol", any drink containing ethanol
A fermented drink is a beverage containing alcohol because of a metabolic process that converts sugar to acids, gases and/or alcohol (e.g. beer or wine).
An alcoholic beverage is a drink containing ethanol, commonly known as alcohol -- although in chemistry the definition of alcohol includes many other compounds. beverages
A drink (a liquor or brew) containing ethanol, commonly known as alcohol.

Alcohol intoxication is a physiological state induced by the ingestion of ethyl alcohol.
Any drinkable liquid; a beverage.

An establishment licensed to sell alcoholic beverages to be consumed on or off the premises; they often provide meals and sometimes accommodation.
A list of addresses that serves as a reference point for other addresses.

A political group considered as a formal whole, united under one specific political platform of issues and campaigning to take part in government.

A political organization that subscribes to a certain ideology and seeks to attain political power through representation in government.

description: A beer, as a golden-colored lager, in a frosty mug. Depicted with a frothy head spilling over the brim. üçª Clinking Beer Mugs is a variation that displays two such beer mugs.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the beer mug emoji pours forth a rich, amber-colored liquid with a frothy, off-white head, all presented with a delightful glossy sheen and precise 3D shading. The glass itself exhibits a subtle sparkle and realistic lighting, highlighting its rounded form and sturdy handle. This celebratory emoji, with its inviting appearance on Apple devices, is perfect for conveying enjoyment, relaxation, a toast, or simply the pleasure of sharing a good drink with friends.
